mnd2:13.9: Yebhuyyena devamanussā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu muyhanti sammuyhanti sampamuyhanti, mūḷhā sammūḷhā sampamūḷhā avijjāya andhīkatā āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitā, taṃ kāraṇā mohanā vuccanti pañca kāmaguṇā.
mnd2:13.10: Mohanasmiṃ pagāḷhoti mohanasmiṃ pagāḷho ogāḷho ajjhogāḷho nimuggoti—
mnd2:14.5: Idha bhikkhu vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjaṃ.

mnd2:15.2: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.

mnd2:15.7: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāya cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.
mnd2:15.8: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāya cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.
mnd2:15.9: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.
mnd2:15.10: Sotāpannassa sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vicikicchāya sīlabbataparāmāsā diṭṭhānusayā vicikicchānusayā, tadekaṭṭhehi ca kilesehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.
mnd2:15.11: Sakadāgāmissa oḷārikā kāmarāgasaṃyojanā paṭighasaṃyojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā, tadekaṭṭhehi ca kilesehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.
mnd2:15.12: Anāgāmissa anusahagatā kāmarāgasaṃyojanā paṭighasaṃyojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā, tadekaṭṭhehi ca kilesehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.
mnd2:15.13: Arahato rūpārūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā, tadekaṭṭhehi ca kilesehi bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.
mnd2:16.2: Upadhi vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca.
mnd2:16.4: Yo sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.

mnd2:17.2: Yo so evaṃ guhāyaṃ satto, evaṃ bahukehi kilesehi channo, evaṃ mohanasmiṃ pagāḷho, so kāyavivekāpi dūre, cittavivekāpi dūre, upadhivivekāpi dūre vidūre suvidūre na santike na sāmantā anāsanne vivekaṭṭhe.
mnd2:17.3: Tathāvidhoti tādiso tassaṇṭhito tappakāro tappaṭibhāgo yo so mohanasmiṃ pagāḷhoti—

mnd2:59.3: Khuddako sīlakkhandho, mahanto sīlakkhandho, sīlaṃ patiṭṭhā ādi caraṇaṃ saṃyamo saṃvaro mokkhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
mnd2:60.2: Idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
mnd2:60.3: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
mnd2:60.4: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti—

mnd2:61.2: Idha bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato, ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammādukkhakkhayagāminiyā.

mnd2:98.6: Evaṃ phandamāne paphandamāne samphandamāne vipphandamāne vedhamāne pavedhamāne sampavedhamāne passatha dakkhatha oloketha nijjhāyatha upaparikkhathāti—
mnd2:99.2: Yathā macchā appodake parittodake udakapariyādāne kākehi vā kulalehi vā balākāhi vā paripātiyamānā ukkhipiyamānā khajjamānā phandanti paphandanti samphandanti vipphandanti vedhanti pavedhanti sampavedhanti;
mnd2:99.3: evamevaṃ pajā mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ acchedasaṃkinopi phandanti, acchindantepi phandanti, acchinnepi phandanti, mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ vipariṇāmasaṃkinopi phandanti, vipariṇāmantepi phandanti, vipariṇatepi phandanti paphandanti samphandanti vipphandanti vedhanti pavedhanti sampavedhantīti—
mnd2:100.2: Etaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā passitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā mamattesūti—
mnd2:100.10: Taṇhāmamattaṃ pahāya diṭṭhimamattaṃ paṭinissajjitvā cakkhuṃ amamāyanto sotaṃ amamāyanto ghānaṃ amamāyanto jivhaṃ amamāyanto kāyaṃ amamāyanto manaṃ amamāyanto rūpe …
mnd2:100.42: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme amamāyanto agaṇhanto aparāmasanto anabhinivisanto careyya vihareyya iriyeyya vatteyya pāleyya yapeyya yāpeyyāti—
mnd2:101.4: Yo rāgo sārāgo … pe … abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
mnd2:101.8: Bhavesu āsattiṃ akubbamāno, chandaṃ pemaṃ rāgaṃ khantiṃ akubbamāno ajanayamāno asañjanayamāno anibbattayamāno anabhinibbattayamānoti—
mnd2:105.2: Antāti phasso eko anto phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, atīto eko anto anāgato dutiyo anto, sukhā vedanā eko anto dukkhā vedanā dutiyo anto, nāmaṃ eko anto rūpaṃ dutiyo anto, cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni eko anto cha bāhirāni āyatanāni dutiyo anto, sakkāyo eko anto sakkāyasamudayo dutiyo anto.
mnd2:105.3: Chandoti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasneho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ.
mnd2:105.4: Ubhosu antesu vineyya chandanti ubhosu antesu chandaṃ vineyya paṭivineyya pajaheyya vinodeyya byantiṃ kareyya anabhāvaṃ gameyyāti—
mnd2:106.2: Phassoti cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso ghānasamphasso jivhāsamphasso kāyasamphasso manosamphasso, adhivacanasamphasso, paṭighasamphasso, sukhavedanīyo samphasso dukkhavedanīyo samphasso adukkhamasukhavedanīyo samphasso, kusalo phasso akusalo phasso abyākato phasso, kāmāvacaro phasso rūpāvacaro phasso arūpāvacaro phasso, suññato phasso animitto phasso appaṇihito phasso, lokiyo phasso lokuttaro phasso, atīto phasso anāgato phasso paccuppanno phasso, yo evarūpo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
mnd2:107.1: Phassaṃ pariññāyāti phassaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā—
mnd2:107.5: ayaṃ cakkhusamphasso, ayaṃ sotasamphasso, ayaṃ ghānasamphasso, ayaṃ jivhāsamphasso, ayaṃ kāyasamphasso, ayaṃ manosamphasso, ayaṃ adhivacanasamphasso, ayaṃ paṭighasamphasso, ayaṃ sukhavedanīyo phasso, ayaṃ dukkhavedanīyo phasso, ayaṃ adukkhamasukhavedanīyo phasso, ayaṃ kusalo phasso, ayaṃ akusalo phasso, ayaṃ abyākato phasso, ayaṃ kāmāvacaro phasso, ayaṃ rūpāvacaro phasso, ayaṃ arūpāvacaro phasso, ayaṃ suññato phasso, ayaṃ animitto phasso, ayaṃ appaṇihito phasso, ayaṃ lokiyo phasso, ayaṃ lokuttaro phasso, ayaṃ atīto phasso, ayaṃ anāgato phasso, ayaṃ paccuppanno phassoti jānāti passati—
mnd2:108.3: Aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato ītito upaddavato bhayato upasaggato calato pabhaṅguto adhuvato atāṇato aleṇato asaraṇato rittato tucchato suññato anattato ādīnavato vipariṇāmadhammato asārakato aghamūlato vadhakato vibhavato sāsavato saṅkhatato mārāmisato jātijarābyādhimaraṇadhammato sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammato saṃkilesadhammato samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato tīreti—
mnd2:109.2: Evaṃ tīrayitvā phasse chandarāgaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantiṃ karoti anabhāvaṃ gameti.
mnd2:109.5: Evaṃ so phasso pahīno bhavissati ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃ kato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo”ti—
mnd2:109.11: Yo rāgo sārāgo … pe … abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
mnd2:109.14: Yasseso gedho pahīno samucchinno vūpasanto paṭipassaddho abhabbuppattiko ñāṇagginā daḍḍho, so vuccati agiddho.
mnd2:109.15: So rūpe agiddho sadde agiddho gandhe agiddho rase agiddho phoṭṭhabbe agiddho kule …
mnd2:109.40: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu agiddho agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno vītagedho vigatagedho cattagedho vantagedho muttagedho pahīnagedho paṭinissaṭṭhagedho vītarāgo vigatarāgo cattarāgo vantarāgo muttarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhapaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharatīti—
mnd2:110.5: Kathaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca attānaṃ garahati?
mnd2:110.6: Kataṃ me kāyaduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me kāyasucaritanti—
mnd2:110.8: Kataṃ me vacīduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me vacīsucaritanti—
mnd2:110.10: Kataṃ me manoduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me manosucaritanti—
mnd2:110.12: Kato me pāṇātipāto, akatā me pāṇātipātā veramaṇīti—
mnd2:110.14: Kataṃ me adinnādānaṃ, akatā me adinnādānā veramaṇīti—
mnd2:110.16: Kato me kāmesumicchācāro, akatā me kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇīti—
mnd2:110.18: Kato me musāvādo, akatā me musāvādā veramaṇīti—
mnd2:110.20: Katā me pisuṇā vācā, akatā me pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇīti—
mnd2:110.22: Katā me pharusā vācā, akatā me pharusāya vācāya veramaṇīti—
mnd2:110.24: Kato me samphappalāpo, akatā me samphappalāpā veramaṇīti—
mnd2:110.26: Katā me abhijjhā, akatā me anabhijjhāti—
mnd2:110.28: Kato me byāpādo, akato me abyāpādoti—
mnd2:110.30: Katā me micchādiṭṭhi, akatā me sammādiṭṭhīti—
mnd2:110.32: Evaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca attānaṃ garahati.
mnd2:110.65: Evaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca attānaṃ garahati.
mnd2:110.66: Evaṃ attagarahitaṃ kammaṃ akubbamāno ajanayamāno asañjanayamāno anibbattayamāno anabhinibbattayamānoti—
mnd2:110.75: Dhīroti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
mnd2:110.76: Dhīro taṇhālepaṃ pahāya diṭṭhilepaṃ paṭinissajjitvā diṭṭhe na limpati, sute na limpati, mute na limpati, viññāte na limpati, na palimpati, na upalimpati.
mnd2:110.77: Alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd2:114.2: Saññāti kāmasaññā byāpādasaññā vihiṃsāsaññā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṃsāsaññā rūpasaññā saddasaññā gandhasaññā rasasaññā phoṭṭhabbasaññā dhammasaññā—
mnd2:114.5: Saññaṃ pariññāti saññaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā—
mnd2:115.3: ayaṃ kāmasaññā, ayaṃ byāpādasaññā, ayaṃ vihiṃsāsaññā, ayaṃ nekkhammasaññā, ayaṃ abyāpādasaññā, ayaṃ avihiṃsāsaññā, ayaṃ rūpasaññā, ayaṃ saddasaññā, ayaṃ gandhasaññā, ayaṃ rasasaññā, ayaṃ phoṭṭhabbasaññā, ayaṃ dhammasaññāti jānāti passati—
mnd2:116.3: Aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato ītito upaddavato bhayato upasaggato calato pabhaṅguto … pe …samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato tīreti—
mnd2:117.2: Evaṃ tīrayitvā saññāya chandarāgaṃ pajahati vinodeti anabhāvaṃ gameti.
mnd2:117.5: Evaṃ sā saññā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃ katā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā”ti—
mnd2:117.7: Saññaṃ pariññāti saññaṃ imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā.
mnd2:117.8: Vitareyya oghanti kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vītivatteyyāti—
mnd2:118.10: Yā paññā pajānanā … pe … amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi, tena ñāṇena samannāgato muni monappattoti.
mnd2:119.2: Tividhānaṃ kāyaduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyapariññā kāyamoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato maggo kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāye chandarāgassa pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyasaṅkhāranirodho catutthajjhānasamāpatti kāyamoneyyaṃ—
mnd2:120.2: Catubbidhānaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, vācāpariññā vacīmoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato maggo vacīmoneyyaṃ, vācāya chandarāgassa pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, vacīsaṅkhāranirodho dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyyaṃ—
mnd2:121.2: Tividhānaṃ manoduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, cittārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, cittapariññā manomoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato maggo manomoneyyaṃ, citte chandarāgassa pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, cittasaṅkhāranirodho saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ manomoneyyaṃ—
mnd2:124.1: Imehi tīhi moneyyehi dhammehi samannāgatā cha munino—
mnd2:124.2: agāramunino, anagāramunino, sekhamunino, asekhamunino, paccekamunino, munimuninoti.
mnd2:128.7: Muni taṇhālepaṃ pahāya diṭṭhilepaṃ paṭinissajjitvā pariggahesu na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati.
mnd2:128.8: Alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd2:129.3: rāgasallaṃ, dosasallaṃ, mohasallaṃ, mānasallaṃ, diṭṭhisallaṃ, sokasallaṃ, kathaṃkathāsallaṃ.
mnd2:129.4: Yassete sallā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati abbūḷhasallo abbahitasallo uddhatasallo samuddhatasallo uppāṭitasallo samuppāṭitasallo cattasallo vantasallo muttasallo pahīnasallo paṭinissaṭṭhasallo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhapaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharatīti—
mnd2:130.1: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattanto pālento yapento yāpento.
mnd2:130.2: Appamattoti sakkaccakārī sātaccakārī aṭṭhitakārī anolīnavuttiko anikkhittacchando anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
mnd2:130.3: “Kathāhaṃ aparipūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ paripūreyyaṃ, paripūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggaṇheyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamādo kusalesu dhammesu.
mnd2:130.4: “Kathāhaṃ aparipūraṃ vā samādhikkhandhaṃ paripūreyyaṃ, paripūraṃ vā samādhikkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggaṇheyyaṃ … pe …kusalesu dhammesu.
mnd2:130.9: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ paripūreyyaṃ, paripūraṃ vā vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggaṇheyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamādo kusalesu dhammesu.
mnd2:130.10: “Kathāhaṃ apariññātaṃ vā dukkhaṃ parijāneyyaṃ, appahīne vā kilese pajaheyyaṃ, abhāvitaṃ vā maggaṃ bhāveyyaṃ, asacchikataṃ vā nirodhaṃ sacchikareyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti—
mnd2:131.1: Nāsīsatī lokamimaṃ parañcāti imaṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati sakattabhāvaṃ, paralokaṃ nāsīsati parattabhāvaṃ;
mnd2:131.2: imaṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati sakarūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ, paraṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati pararūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ;
mnd2:131.3: imaṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, paraṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati cha bāhirāni āyatanāni;
mnd2:131.4: imaṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati manussalokaṃ, paraṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati devalokaṃ.
mnd2:131.5: Imaṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati kāmadhātuṃ, paraṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati rūpadhātuṃ arūpadhātuṃ;
mnd2:131.6: imaṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātuṃ, paraṃ lokaṃ nāsīsati arūpadhātuṃ.
mnd2:131.7: Puna gatiṃ vā upapattiṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ vā bhavaṃ vā saṃsāraṃ vā vaṭṭaṃ vā nāsīsati na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti nātijappatīti—
